mapper.select: SELECT a.case_id , a.case_name , a.administrator , DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS create_date , a.description , (SELECT CASE WHEN process_state = '0' THEN 'Ready' WHEN process_state = '1' THEN 'Processing' WHEN process_state = '2' THEN 'Complete' END FROM evidence_info where case_id = a.case_id and isdelete='N' order by process_state desc limit 1) process_state , (select count(1) from case_user_auth where case_id = a.case_id) case_user_cnt , (select count(1) from evidence_info where case_id = a.case_id and isdelete='N') evidence_cnt , (select count(1) from log2timeline where case_id = a.case_id) logtimeline_cnt FROM case_info a WHERE a.case_id = #{case_id}

SELECT a.evd_id, a.evd_name, a.evd_path, a.sub_type, a.timezone, a.acquired_date, a.md5 evd_md5, a.sha1 evd_sha1, a.sha3 evd_sha3, a.process_state, b.par_id, b.par_name, b.par_size, b.sector_size, b.md5 par_md5, b.sha1 par_sha1, b.sha3 par_sha3, b.start_sector, b.filesystem, b.par_label FROM evidence_info a, partition_info b WHERE a.evd_id = b.evd_id and a.case_id = #{case_id}

SELECT a.evd_name , SUM(b.cnt) AS cnt FROM evidence_info a , (SELECT c.evd_id , COUNT(d.id) AS cnt FROM partition_info c , file_info d WHERE 1=1 AND c.par_id = d.par_id GROUP BY c.evd_id ) b WHERE 1=1 AND a.isdelete = 'N' AND a.evd_id = b.evd_id AND a.case_id = #{case_id} GROUP BY a.evd_name
